content.rendered:
Directed by V. Harikrishna. Ponkumaran

Written by V. Harikrishna

Cast Darshan Thoogudeep (Krishna). Rashmika Mandanna (Kaveri). Dhananjaya (Mittayi Soori). Devaraj (Gurikar Huliyappa Nayaka). Tanya Hope (Ganga) .Baby Aaradhya.Master Abhinav.Adithya.Master Amith.Anand.Arasu.Shankar Ashwath.Nitin Basavaraj. Sanju Basayya (Krishna’s Friend).Chaaya.Girish Chandra. P.D. Sathish Chandra (Worker).Dattanna. Prajwal Devaraj (Special Appearance).Dushyanth.Geetha.Giri.Hanumanthe Gowda.Nagaraj Gowda.Hasan.Manjunath Hegde. Hithesh (Worker).James.Jayarama.Jehangir.Rajashekar Kadamba.Kamaraj. Dharma Keerthiraj (Special Appearance).Kevin. Sadhu Kokila (Captain Jaganmohan).Mohan Kumar.Surendra Kumar.Nagarajmurthy Kv.Sharath Lohitashwa.Supriya Lohith.Lokesh.Chandru Mahadev.Baby Milana. Malathishree Mysore (Krishna’s Grandmother). Yash Nadaf (Kaveri’s Brother).Narayanaswamy.Prashanth Natana.Ranjan Natana.Manjunath Ngef.Niranjan. Shivaraj K.R. Pete (Worker).Peter.Ponkumar.Thirtha Ponnappa. Vinod Prabhakar (Special Appearance). Srinivasa Prabhu (Judge).Prajwal.Surya Praveen.Preetham. Prem (Special Appearance).Raakesh. Vijay Raghavendra (Special Appearance).Rakashak. Radha Ramachandra (Kaveri’s Grandmother). Mandya Ramesh (Kashi).Venkat Rao. Ravishankar (Pulla Reddy).Rekha.Krishna Sanchaya.Malati Sardeshpande. Chiranjeevi Sarja (Special Appearance). Shakib Shams (Ali reza). P. Ravi Shankar (Pulla Reddy). Sharan (Special Appearance). Prakash Shenoy. Prakash Shetty. Shamanth Shetty. Yash Shetty ((as Yeshwanth Shetty)). Bharath Singh. Thakur Anoop Singh (Devi Shetty). Raghu Sirsi. Master Skanda. Sneha. Murali Sringeri. Mahesh Challenging Star. Steve. Suchitra (Huliyappa Nayak’s Wife). Rockline Sudhakar. Sudharani. Moogu Suresh. Swaraj. Uday

Languages Kannada

Producers Shylaja Nag. Ashok Shetty. B. Suresha

Production Media House Studio
